title.en: A Prayer to the Vidyādhara and Great Tertön Lerab Lingpa

text.en: Emaho: O Wonder!
text.en-trans: emaho

text.en: The sovereign and ‘sole deity’ of the Land of Snows was Lord Tri Songdetsen:
text.en-trans: gang jong lha chik ngadak trisong jéi

text.en: You were his Dharma minister, born into the Nanam clan,
text.en-trans: chökyi lönpo nanam rik su trung

text.en: Always cared for by Orgyen Padma, throughout your many lives,
text.en-trans: kyé mang orgyen pemé jé su zung

text.en: Master of mantras, Dorje Dudjom—to you we pray!
text.en-trans: ngak chang dorjé düdjom la solwa dep

text.en: You attained the supreme realization of buddhahood,
text.en-trans: khyö nyi gyalwé sa chok drup nyé kyang

text.en: Yet, so as not to abandon, but care for, beings needing to be tamed,
text.en-trans: dulja yelwa mi dor jé zung chir

text.en: You returned as Ngödrup Gyaltsen,1Lekden Je,2Pema Trinle3and so on—
text.en-trans: ngödrup gyaltsen lekden pé trin sok

text.en: To you, the succession of glorious protectors of the teachings and beings, we pray!
text.en-trans: tendröi pal gön jön la solwa dep

text.en: Close by the peak of Kosala’s hidden land,
text.en-trans: béyul kosala yi u tséi char

text.en: In the male fire dragon year of the fourteenth cycle,4
text.en-trans: rabjung chu zhi mé po druk gi lor

text.en: You took birth in the household of Shyipa, in the family of Tra,
text.en-trans: tra rig zhipé khyim du ku kyé zhé

text.en: Nirmanakāya Sönam Gyalpo, ‘king of merit’—to you we pray!
text.en-trans: trulku sönam gyalpor solwa dep

text.en: Entering into the teachings, you mastered reading and writing unhindered, and then
text.en-trans: tenpé gor zhuk lok dri tokmé khyen

text.en: On an isolated mountainside, in your sleep you dreamt that then
text.en-trans: wenpé ri la zimpé nal lam du

text.en: Mistress of Mantra, Ekajaṭī, showed you her face
text.en-trans: ngak dak ral chik ma yi zhal ten né

text.en: And plunged her white fang into your heart. Startled and shaken,
text.en-trans: tsem kar nying la tsukpé kyen gyi ngang

text.en: You were stricken with sickness, and turned your back on parents and home.
text.en-trans: ku la nyun pok pa khyim yul pang né

text.en: Going to the Dharma camp of the powerful siddha Nyala Padma Düdul, who attained the rainbow body,
text.en-trans: drubwang jalüpa yi chö gar peb

text.en: You studied with Jetsün Chomden Dorje—Lama Sönam Taye,5
text.en-trans: jetsün chomden dorjéi jé su zung

text.en: And through the oral instructions, liberated the stream of your wisdom mind—to you we pray!
text.en-trans: dampé tuk gyü drol la solwa dep

text.en: Your karmic predisposition from before awakened and the guardian of the termas
text.en-trans: ngön gyi rig sé ter gyi sungma yi

text.en: Placed the treasure casket in your hands. You went to Kathok,
text.en-trans: ter drom ngö su pul zhing katok jön

text.en: Where from Tenpe Gyaltsen6—Shyingkyong Gönpo—who was Dorje Drolö in person, and from
text.en-trans: drolö ngö nang tenpé gyaltsen sok

text.en: Many other teachers, you received immeasurable empowerments and instructions,
text.en-trans: lobpön mang ten mindrol pakmé sen

text.en: From the ḍākinīs’ code script, you deciphered immeasurable teachings,
text.en-trans: shok ser ngö lé da bep pakmé nang

text.en: Which you kept secret, reserving them solely for your own practice.
text.en-trans: sangwé gyé tap rang nyam tsechik lang

text.en: As the sign of accomplishment, you became inseparable from the deities;
text.en-trans: drubpé tak tön lha dang nyisu mé

text.en: Lord of siddhas—to you we pray!
text.en-trans: drub pé wang chuk khyé la solwa dep

text.en: Going to Dzahka, from Dzahka Choktrul Rinpoche7
text.en-trans: dzakar peb té choktrul rinpocher

text.en: You received the detailed profound instruction on the ‘Vajra Essence’, and
text.en-trans: dorjé nyingpö zab tri gyépa sen

text.en: At the feet of Nyoshul Lungtok Tenpe Nyima,
text.en-trans: lungtok tenpé nyimé zhap la tuk

text.en: You received the nectar of the instructions, and perfected total understanding and knowledge.
text.en-trans: dampé düdtsi zhé né khyen rap dzok

text.en: From Jamyang Khyentse, Jamgön Kongtrul Lodrö Taye,
text.en-trans: jamyang khyentsé lodrö tayé dang

text.en: Mipham Jampal Dorje and the like, learned and accomplished masters,
text.en-trans: jampal dorjé la sok khédrup lé

text.en: You received, contemplated on and brought to fruition limitless empowerments and instructions.
text.en-trans: mindrol tayé sen sam tar chin dzé

text.en: Supreme chief among the learned—to you we pray!
text.en-trans: khépé khyu chok khyö la solwa dep

text.en: In the lands of Tibet and Greater Tibet, China and the like,
text.en-trans: bö dang bö chen jong dang gya sok yul

text.en: You travelled to all the sacred places, and before all the holy images,
text.en-trans: né chen kun jön lha ten tamché la

text.en: You practised and made countless offerings, prostrations and circumambulations.
text.en-trans: drup dang chöpa chak kor duma dzé

text.en: You received many profound termas, and to fortunate disciples from everywhere
text.en-trans: zap ter mang zhé chok mé kalden la

text.en: You granted empowerments and instructions, and set them on the path to liberation.
text.en-trans: min drol pakmé nang zhing tarlam kö

text.en: In this sublime activity of ripening, for the benefit of Dharma and beings,
text.en-trans: ten dang dro la minpé dzé zang gi

text.en: You spent your entire life, from beginning to end.
text.en-trans: kutsé tö mé kuntu dawar dzé

text.en: To you who possess wondrous compassion, we pray!
text.en-trans: méjung tukjé chen la solwa dep

text.en: Single-mindedly, in various places, you lived on remote, deserted mountains,
text.en-trans: tse chik chok mé wen rir shuk né su

text.en: Concentrating all your innermost practice into one—
text.en-trans: nang gi nyam len dak la chik tu dril

text.en: Abandoning harm towards others, along with the states of mind behind it,
text.en-trans: zhen nö zhi dang chepa yang pang shing

text.en: And continuously using skilful means to benefit others, in whatever way they needed,
text.en-trans: zhen pen gang dul tap khé gyün ché mé

text.en: A devotion to the non-partisan teaching, and pure perception dawned.
text.en-trans: rimé ten la gü shing dak nang shar

text.en: Speaking to the learned, in precise detail, about all of the outer and inner Dharma,
text.en-trans: shé den dak la chi nang chö kun gyi

text.en: You ignited the torch of the teachings.
text.en-trans: dro leng zhipmöi tenpé sal je bar

text.en: Supreme holder of the teaching of the buddhas—to you I pray!
text.en-trans: gyalwé tendzin chok la solwa dep

text.en: Unobscured by any hindrance in explaining, debating or composing—
text.en-trans: ché tsö tsom la chak tok dribpa dral

text.en: Without a break, day and night, you were merged continuously with luminosity.
text.en-trans: barmé nyin tsen ösel khor yuk dré

text.en: As signs of your accomplishment, the butter lamps lit themselves,
text.en-trans: drubpé tak su marmé rang bar dang

text.en: From the practice torma—the deity phurba—flowed a great flood of nectar,
text.en-trans: drup tor lha pur dudtsii char chen yo

text.en: Through the power of your samādhi, you reconsecrated sacred sites very far away, and
text.en-trans: ring wé sa né ting dzin tu yi sol

text.en: At your command, the guardians themselves removed profound hidden termas.
text.en-trans: zab ter bé dön sung mar cholwé drup

text.en: Though it was obvious that you could read the minds of others and the like,
text.en-trans: zhen sem shé sok ngön pa tra na ang

text.en: You never vaunted your qualities. Hidden yogin—to you we pray!
text.en-trans: yönten ngom mé bé la solwa dep

text.en: Your whole life long, striving for the benefit of the teachings and beings,
text.en-trans: kutsé ril por tendröi dön la tsön

text.en: You created countless supports for the body, speech, and mind of the buddhas,
text.en-trans: gyalwé ku sung tuk ten pakmé trun

text.en: Manifesting the play of skilful means to tame each according to their needs,
text.en-trans: gang dul tap kyi rol tsé natsok tön

text.en: Through your pure perception you met the deities and masters,
text.en-trans: dakpé nangwé lha dang lama jal

text.en: In many pure visions you obtained empowerments and instructions of the oral lineage,
text.en-trans: nyen gyü mindrol daknang mangpo tob

text.en: You opened the great Dharma door of earth treasures and mind treasures,
text.en-trans: sa ter gong ter chö kyi go chen ché

text.en: Your enlightened activity spread everywhere, your actions equal to space,
text.en-trans: dzé trin namkha nyampé trinlé dal

text.en: Trinle Drodul Tsal—to you we pray!
text.en-trans: trinlé drodul tsal la solwa dep

text.en: With your activity, like this, equalling the sky,
text.en-trans: dé tar namkha nyampé trinlé ché

text.en: So as to spur to the Dharma those who grasped at permanence,
text.en-trans: tak dzin chen nam chö la kulwé lé

text.en: In the fifteenth cycle, on the tenth day of the first month of the fire tiger year,
text.en-trans: rabjung cho nga mé tak da tse la

text.en: You straightened your body, and in a manner that brought benefit to others, you departed.
text.en-trans: ku lü drangpor zhuk zhin zhen dön shek

text.en: From your body came relics of the five families, and you attained complete enlightenment.
text.en-trans: ku lé dung rig nga jön dzok sangyé

text.en: In your compassion, you did not forsake all the beings in samsaric existence,
text.en-trans: sipé dro kun tukjé mi tongwé

text.en: But were reborn, returning in two incarnations, as made clear in the prophecies.
text.en-trans: yang si zung chik jönpé ka lung sal

text.en: Supreme and completely perfect teacher—to you we pray!
text.en-trans: ngön dzok tönpa chok la solwa dep

text.en: Through the power and blessing of this prayer:
text.en-trans: détar solwa tap pé tu jin gyi

text.en: Throughout the whole world, may the benefit for the teachings and beings never fail but grow,
text.en-trans: yang sé gyal kham tendro mi nyam pel

text.en: May I and beings who are my mothers, all together
text.en-trans: dak dang mar gyur drowa rimé pé

text.en: Purify all karma and obscurations, and never be parted from you, our noble teacher.
text.en-trans: lé drip kun jang jetsün khyé nyi dang

text.en: May we be worthy to receive your instructions:
text.en-trans: nam yang dralmé dampé nö gyur té

text.en: Care for us, and grant us your blessings—we pray!
text.en-trans: jé su dzin ching chin gyi lap tu sol

text.en: Having become inseparable from you, as our one and only deity,
text.en-trans: lha chik khyé dang yermé gyur né su

text.en: May all beings, equal to the sky, be able to find liberation!
text.en-trans: namkha nyampé dro nam drol nü shok
